title: Please Nerf Sion.
body:
1. Remove the slow on his E (or whatever that skill shot is that throws minions)
2. Fix the AoE marker on his Q
3. FIX THE AoE MARKER ON HIS Q
4. **FIX THE AoE MARKER ON HIS Q**

OR JUST FIX THE AoE MARKER ON HIS Q AND HE'LL BE FINE. NOTHING LIKE GETTING HIT BY IT WHEN YOU'RE OBVIOUSLY OUT OF IT.

replies.body: He dose not need nerf. You just need to counter pick him with 'aftershock rune'. Try poppy, ornn and riven.

interesting fact, the vfx for sion's q is wrong since it only display that knockup is possible after around 1.1s when in reality you can actually cancel slightly before 1s if you need the fast knockup. It's a form of skill expression since the vfx is put there to midlead you.
